entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ASP.NET Core MVC : UrlHelper.Action fail to resolve when mixing nullable route value and query string parameters #36352
  • Why are there so many using statements when using the extract to file option? #36348
    Razor.Tooling
  • VS2022 Razor editor - No way to get full completion list within @bind-Value #36347
    17.0-Preview5
  • Unrecognized '@' block type #36345
  • Use `PublishUrl` as default value for `PublishDir` in .NET SDK #36343
  • Ensure WASM native asset support is merged for RC2 #36333
    6.0-rc2
  • InstallJdk incorrectly thinks jdk is already installed #36331
  • Issue: Consume multiple BlazorCustomElements in js-frameworks (React, Vue, etc) #36329
  • Blazor app won't compile due to auto-generated __Blazor namespaces #36326
    Backlog
  • Startup regression: endpoint, https, plaintext #36323
  • Prevent CSS039 Unexpected character sequence in property value. #36321
    17.0-Preview5
  • Can we remove the MapToDocumentEdits call in Razor On Type formatting? #36319
    Next sprint planning
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main .NET Core 3.1 Release, validation-aspnetcore-.NET Core 3.1 Release, aspnetcore #aspnetcore-107590-.NETCore3.1Release #36318
  • API1001 False Positive on 202 response #36315
  • models list validation return display name #36312
  • [Blazor-wasm] multi-threading support via workers. #36311
    Backlog

Closed

  • Hot Reload: Adding a code block at runtime does not get hot reloaded, even refreshing the browser doesn't show the change. #34465
    6.0-rc2
  • Circular dependency error when publishing webdeploy package using .net 5.0.300 #35134
  • Quarantining `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.FunctionalTests.LinkedApplicationTests.LinkedApplicationWorks` #35977
    .NET 7 Planning
  • RouteEndpoint metadata from convention builders are duplicated #34199
    6.0-rc2
  • Startup improvement: fortunes #36295
  • Perf improvement: endpoint #36322
  • Upgrade to the latest Bootstrap version #19225
    6.0-rc2
  • HttpLoggingMiddleware is overly aggressive at redacting headers #36156
    6.0-rc2
  • Blazor WASM: Publish from MSBuild does not create wwwroot\_framework folder #29626
    6.0-rc1
  • minimal API - Package template #34010
    Backlog
  • .NET 6 web app templates, remove app.UseDeveloperExceptionPage(); #36327
    6.0-rc2
  • Add `.cshtml.css` styles in default project templates #31030
    6.0-rc2
  • Kestrel certificate with docker-compose: BIO routines:BIO_new_file:no such file #36211
  • DotNetStreamReference class no longer exists #36316
  • Loading session state asynchronously - potential usage problem #27733
    6.0-rc2
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Polly: Deadlock when retrying a "503 - Service unavailable" #28384
    6.0-rc2
  • Run Blazor Server app using dotnet watch, the second counter loses its state(resets count to 0) when IncrementAmount attribute is added to the first counter. #36299
  • [Question] How to call .UseSystemd() in the new (.NET 6 preview 7) minimal templates #36324
  • Single file build time regression: proxy-yarp #36136
  • Startup regression: endpoint, fortunes #36212
  • Startup regression: fortunes_ef, updates #36216
  • Startup regression: json #36263
  • Visual Studio IDE hangs on CSHTML edit #27666
    17.0-Preview5

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove WebView path/query code that isn't used anymore #36354
    area-blazor
  • Check for duplicate endpoint names on startup #36353
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] Fix component governance bugs #36351
  • [release/5.0] Fix component governance bugs #36350
    tell-mode, 5.0.11
  • [release/6.0] Add Win11 helix-matrix/quarantine queue, remove win7/8 #36349
    area-infrastructure
  • Remove `dotnet-core` feed #36346
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/3.1] Remove blob feeds #36344
  • [release/6.0] Fixed duplicate metadata in ModelDataSource #36340
    area-runtime
  • Stop using unencrypted git protocol in build.gradle #36330
    area-signalr

Merged

  • Fix component governance bugs #36342
    7.0-preview1
  • Add Win11 helix-matrix/quarantine queue, remove win7/8 #36040
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Update branding to 2.1.31 #36341
  • Fixed duplicate metadata in ModelDataSource #36337
    feature-routing, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Un-redact safe request/response headers in HttpLoggingMiddleware #36336
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc2
  • Un-redact safe request/response headers in HttpLoggingMiddleware #36307
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Correct the docs on ISession.IsAvailable #36332
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/5.0] Align CODEOWNERS with 'main' #35953
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.11
  • [release/5.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `2d924d7` to `955c7f8` #36022
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.11
  • [release/3.1] Align CODEOWNERS with 'main' #35950
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.20
  • [release/6.0 Cleanup remaining SSP references #36248
    area-infrastructure, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0] Support platforms where crossgen2 is not available #36325
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0] Move OpenAPI extensions to routing assembly #36310
    area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0] Dispose the prior response on retry #36313
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc2
  • Update branding for 5.0.11 #36236
    area-infrastructure
  • Correct the docs on ISession.IsAvailable #36301
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Update node version referenced in docs #36317
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Add build troubleshooting suggestion #36178
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `2d924d7` to `955c7f8` #36021
    area-infrastructure
  • Unquarantine test #36297
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Dispose the prior response on retry #36162
    area-runtime, feature-httpclientfactory, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Improve error messages for missing body and services #36064
    area-runtime, api-approved, area-web-frameworks
  • Add analyzer for detecting mismatched endpoint parameter optionality #36154
    area-web-frameworks
  • Handle shortened JSON file in `dotnet openapi` #36171
    area-commandlinetools, feature-openapi
  • [release/2.1] Correct and streamline internal builds #30729
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Initial Bootstrap v4 SxS support #35981
    area-identity
  • Use GetEndpoint extension method #35886
    area-mvc, area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Jmprieur/fix web api templates #36130
    area-mvc, community-contribution, feature-templates
  • Update Program.cs #36103
    area-mvc
  • PR benchmarks #36309
    area-perf
  • Blazor Request Localization Updates Culture for All Threads #36259
    area-runtime
  • Implement 100 Continue for HTTP/3 #36168
    area-runtime
